title: Gsync laptop + In game Vsync = BUG!!! Help Please.
body: Hi my computer has NVidia G-Sync however when I turn on the ingame V-sync as well the frame cap will stop working. This only happened after the latest windows update. Turning both on makes the game the smoothest. Help please why does frame cap not work if both are on? and IS IT BETTER to use compatibility mode for windows 8 or don't worry about it? I have windows 10.

replies.body: I had to reach out to some of my tech buddies for this one, but since G-Sync and V-sync are essentially two different technologies they aren't going to work in the best way when both are on. It'd probably be best to try to stick with one so let's go with G-Sync for now. If it's not working very well, go ahead and try switching to just V-sync. Test those in a custom game and lemme know how it goes!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zdKAgspg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-06T20:29:21.229+0000)

I turned g-sync off and using v-sync find that the smoothest. When u turn both on for some reason frame rate just wont cap.
